3.124. 
Division of property by court decision without dissolution of the marriage 
If one spouse has been declared to be incapable in a particular area or to have limited capacity in a particular area, or if he or she has mismanaged the community property or by his or her actions endangered the community property and the interests of the family, or if he or she has failed to make a contribution to the satisfaction of the family's needs without a sufficient reason, then the other spouse shall have the right to apply to the court for the division of the property.
